thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Bill Ames
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Bill Ames

author: Bill Ames
title: Bill Ames
text: The Wilson amplifier I use (a 2008 model year) allows me cell service where I would not normally be able to access. The few times I have needed support (power supply and antennas) Wilson has been very friendly, helpful and informative. Over the years I think their service has become (if possible) even better.
